pullRequest.title: HADOOP-17323 Skipping IO for root directory when empty directory flag is not required.
pullRequest.bodyText: Ran ITestS3AFileOperationCost in raw mode using ap-south-1 bucket. Saw no failures.

commit.message:
HADOOP-17323 Skipping IO for root directory when empty directory
flag is not required.

nodes.bodyText: nit: add a space after if

for strictness, how about before L270 you do a status.toString() into a variable, and include that at the end of each describedAs message. That way, if there really was an assertion failure, we'd see the status
